alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:48PM EST until January 15 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of upstate South Carolina, including the following counties, Cherokee and York. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Rivers remain high due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 546 PM EST, Water levels on the Ninety Nine Islands reservoir will continue to fall, dropping below 104 feet tonight. Continue to watch for flooding along low-lying areas along the Broad River and around the reservoir. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
